PATIENT_ID: TEST_GERIATRIC_HIP_NC_001
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-02-22 06:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-02-22 06:10:00
Category II activation for 80-year-old female. Ground-level fall.
Age 80. Right hip pain and deformity.
BP 148/88, HR 78, RR 16, GCS 15.

[IMAGING] 2026-02-22 06:30:00
AP pelvis x-ray: right intertrochanteric fracture confirmed.
Hip fracture identified on imaging. Proximal femur fracture.
Imaging confirms hip fracture.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-22 07:00:00
Orthopedic consultation obtained. Orthopedic assessment completed.
Surgical intervention recommended. ORIF planned.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-24 16:00:00
Hospital day 3. Surgery delayed due to OR availability.
Operative deferred. Surgery delayed beyond 48 hours from admission.
Surgical intervention delayed. Patient still awaiting operative fixation.
